LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Mundanus
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic that does not fall into its own field of study.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcane Crafting
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The use of magic and other esoteric methods in crafting.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: General Skills
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: General physicality skills needed for any advance training.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Miscian
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of how different types of elemental magic interact.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Agni
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic that is capable of producing fire and heat.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Isa
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic that is capable of reducing temperatures and freezing objects.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Gala
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic that is capable of manipulating wind.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Glaerc
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic capable of inducing an electric current.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Styrian
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic capable of directly moving or creating objects.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Gloana
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic capable of creating light.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Sula
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: description>The study of magic capable of creating and manipulating earth.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Lifian
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic capable of manipulating the living, the dead, and what lies between.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Arcanus Laubu
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: The study of magic created by beliefs.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Physicality Training
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Covers skills based on one’s physical condition.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Mental Training
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Covers skills based on one’s mental and social ability.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Equipment Training
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Covers skills based off of one’s ability to make the most of one’s chosen equipment.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Self-Control Training
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Covers skills based off of one’s ability to control one’s self.
